data.message: I'm a surgeon with a pen and the note pad is where I operate, I'm accelerating like accelerant on gas spreading fire sending out heatwaves, I'm sicker than a vampire hallucinating on wolfs bane , so what do you say, your hate gives me strength to slay anyone who gets in the way constantly collecting more confidence because I'm a marksman when I aim, my brain is the lab, I have thoughts so dark like I'm mixing meth with alcohol I'm breaking bad, I'm genetically engineering generating whole generation through the thoughts I have so you can say I'm the angel of rap because someone has to watch over the game and make sure it lasts.
